resources.string: Developers of Market Application are Bachana (Bachi) Mosulishvili and Nick Kapanadze. The application is simple prototype of an online store, where everyone can buy and sell technic, musical instruments and so on. You can use Market feedback about application issues and write us in "Contact" section.*
*You must be logged in to contact us.
You are now trying to contact the developers of our team.
Read warning below carefully before sending feedback.
* Please be confident and wait for our reply after messaging us.
* Please specify the reason of your contact in subject obviously.
* Please do not use swearing words and do not insult us.
* Please check your mail below and then write a message:
